programme.title: ATL Homicide
programme.sub-title: ATL Homicide - Deadly Double Cross: Ernest Wilson and Lamar Francis
programme.desc: When a murder investigation of two college students hits a dead end, Quinn and Vince are brought in to revive the case. They zero in on a suspect, but shut down when he has an alibi. They will stop at nothing to win justice for their victims.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A young Detroit woman seems to have it all – a loving family, a doting boyfriend, an exciting new job – until one day, she inexplicably goes missing. After she’s found dead, scandals and secrets come to light, pointing detectives to a killer overcome by rage.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: In the early morning of New Year�s Day 2009, Oakland resident Oscar Grant is shot in the back by a BART transit officer at Fruitvale Station. Within days, dramatic cell phone videos of Oscar�s shooting go public, igniting a global fight for justice.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: When two beloved young men are brutally gunned down in the streets of Roanoke, this typically quiet tourist town must face the harsh reality that no city, not even small-town USA, is safe from gang violence.

programme.title: Find Our Missing
programme.sub-title: Find Our Missing - Tameka �Kesha�Anderson/ Larry Stackhouse Jr.
programme.desc: A young mother goes missing after she leaves to buy a car. A 19-year-old former basketball player in upstate New York disappears after going to a basketball game with a friend.

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: Police discover a troubling motive when a Connecticut man is badly burned by a gas-fueled blaze, and his wife claims he started the fire during a diabetic delirium.

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: When a Chicago man is shot to death on a visit to Atlanta for his girlfriend's birthday, surveillance footage of the attack leads detectives to believe their victim may have been stalked by a dangerous predator out for revenge

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: When a decorated Navy Commander is found dead in a hotel room, those close to him suspect suicide. But when autopsy results point to homicide, investigators sort through numerous lies to uncover a calculated plot fueled by lust and greed.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Two carpooling commuters find the body of a woman in a parking lot, with her throat slashed. The savage wounds suggest the murder was a crime of passion fueled by rage. But whose rage? Was she killed by her estranged husband – or by his jealous new girlfriend?

programme.title: For My Man
programme.sub-title: For My Man - Lost in Loyalty
programme.desc: A heartbroken young mother is elated to get a second chance at love when she meets the man of her dreams � until she discovers her new lover has a dark side. Before long, she finds her life launched into chaos when she sets out to prove she�s the ride-or-die woman that her man demands.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.sub-title: For My Man - Loving in Fear
programme.desc: Friends and family are stunned when a beautiful college student drops everything to run away with her new man. When she suddenly returns home nine months later, she reveals the shocking story of a brutal murder, notorious drug kingpin, and the destructive desire at the center of her secret life.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: How did university student Cory Robinson end up dead in an extended stay hotel room? While sifting through his love affairs, investigators catch wind of a mysterious person, whose true identity must be revealed to solve the crime.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: When Monica Sykes disappears, questions start swirling around about the men in her life, including a current boyfriend, a recent ex and a young police officer. What detectives can’t know is that a car found, across town, mysteriously engulfed in flames will eventually lead them to the sinister answers about what happened to Monica.

programme.title: A Mother's Intuition
programme.desc: With help from a handsome investigator, a brilliant sculptor unravels the twisted truth behind her missing newborn baby.

programme.title: Down For Whatever
programme.desc: A young successful doctor learns that her newly-found biological sisters are ruthless cop killers that her detective husband is hunting down.

programme.title: Deadly Dispatch
programme.desc: After her best friend IS tragically murdered in an apparent robbery gone wrong, Tiffany Jackson takes justice in her own hands to find his killer.

programme.title: When Love Kills: The Falicia Blakely Story
programme.desc: All Falicia ever wanted was a better life and she found it with Dino. He promised her the world and all she had to do for it was to kill.

programme.title: Stalker
programme.desc: A well-known Hollywood actress is suddenly tormented by a stalker. Her sister and high school boyfriend try to figure out who is tormenting her.
